website_summaries.verdict: This hand-hammered gong comes on its own stand and is compact enough to sit on the corner of your desk, on a coffee table, or a countertop.
pros: We love the look of this attractive brass gong and its black ash stand
Produces a pleasant sound that's bright, but not tinny
Comes with a mallet for striking
cons: Doesn't produce the rich, deep sound you get from much larger gongs

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size for a small desktop gong
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size for a small desktop gong, hitting it feels satisfying, and it makes a decent sound (though of course it can be better). The left leg didn't line up very well when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: bochu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a percussionist, so I appreciate a well made product. While I do think the stand and mallet are a little "cheap," the gong itself is TOP NOTCH. The tonation is fantastic, and it puts myself and the energy of my office in a balanced state of mind. It also looks amazing in my office. More authentic than the overly design-heavy gongs I've seen on Amazon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: While I wanted to get a giant gong that would shake the house, my wife would not let me. This was a good compromise. It looks very stylish and has a decent and not annoying sound.
customer_reviews.author: El Presidente

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and pleasant sound!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and pleasant sound! My co-workers and I love this gong, and look forward to being able to ring it when one of us has accomplished a great task. It has brought us together, increased camaraderie, morale, and productivity, and is a beautifully designed piece to display. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: BeMo

customer_reviews.title: They love it and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have so many people at work coming over to check out this product. They love it and it looks great. The only complaint is the sound isn't very deep. It sounds better when we are using something softer to hit it with than the piece that comes with it (its hard and I think it doesn't work as well as it should) other than that minor complaint its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Unique and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece and i was surprised by how awesome the sound was. It's perfect for what I wanted. My only complaint is it did not come with screws which are vital to the assembly. I did not have any on hand so that was annoying. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool it makes me smile every time I hit it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool it makes me smile every time I hit it when I set an appointment. I wish it was a little bigger but didn't want to go up to the 12" because that is too big.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Was missing a foot, but very nice gong.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturers box was open and one foot was missing on the black gong I ordered. But I'm handy and I immediately made it a whole new base and had it set up before my hubby got home. Had one of my 12" dolls standing in front of it looking like he was swinging the mallet. He loved it. And I loved the deal on a better quality gong that really looks great. May copy the single foot in the future just to complete it, but the new base will work better for my purposes. I like the sound too.
customer_reviews.author: D Pyra

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! The tone is great for ending a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the end of my Meditation Groups! I LOVE IT! The tone is great for ending a meditation session!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loud and attractive
customer_reviews.text: i use this as a quiet signal in my classroom. it's loud enough the students can hear it over their talking and attractive enough they all found it interesting immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Thorn

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: You simply can not beat the quality/value of this gong. Is it a professional musical instrument... no. However, it is larger than I thought it would be, very nice to look at... and sounds fantastic! Its a true gong splash that sounds exactly how you imagine it would with one of this size. I highly recommend. We ring a bell in the office when an order comes in.... we will now be hitting the gong :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mcelhone

customer_reviews.title: Cute and melodious
customer_reviews.text: I use this to announce various activities, like "It's time to leave" around the house. It's small and fits on a desktop or bookcase shelf, but it's quite attractive and has a pleasant sound. It's not a deep gong sound, obviously, but it's not a tinny little piece of annoyance either. It's made by Zildjian, a famous maker of cymbals for drummers.
customer_reviews.author: Applewhite MinyardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not the one. Buy their hanging version for great tone
customer_reviews.text: Have many Woodstock chimes. Returned this. Buy same brands hanging version for a bit more money. Excellent sound even with a gentle tap.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gong!
customer_reviews.text: This gong is awesome! My company wanted one to ring when we accomplished a goal or when catered lunch had arrived. It arrived quickly and well packaged. I was a little surprised by how small it was--as was the rest of the team. However, it is cute and packs a punch for such a small gong as it is LOUD. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cognius

customer_reviews.title: guess I should have read the description a bit better. It's a nice sound
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I expected. guess I should have read the description a bit better. It's a nice sound, and loud enough for my needs. I hit the gong when my sales people get a sale, so everyone can here it, but not too annoying. It's a bit higher pitch gong, of course because of the size
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D Weber

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a gong on-line without being able to hear it, but it has a nice sound. And it looks very nice. Good value for the money. I have a aikido (martial arts) school and it looks great on the shomen.
customer_reviews.author: Big Billie

customer_reviews.title: Sales Gong
customer_reviews.text: Works great - it increased sales in my office. You're only allowed to hit it if you sell something. If you're looking for a motivational tool This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I had a space on top of the piano to fill and this was a perfect addition. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality. Our livingroom is set in an Asian theme, Furniture, pictures, tables and statues. I had a space on top of the piano to fill and this was a perfect addition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, perfect size for tabletop. It’s on one of my end tables. Q&A says it is not specifically tuned but it’s very close to a D pitch, with other overtones when struck. Makes a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: Sounds rather tinny
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was hopeful but upon receiving this gong I was let down. It sounds rather tinny and not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Castro

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim. Came missing pieces. A little to big as a decor item. Crashing clash of gong is not pleasing. Sent it back. Just a weird item.
customer_reviews.author: JBMCR647

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It’s more beautiful than the picture shows. My employees love ringing it when they make a sale. High quality. Nice piece for home or office.
customer_reviews.author: A. Key

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that disappointed me was how prominent the "target/bulls eye" marking is. I hardly noticed it in the photo and I was sure I had received the wrong item. But that's just pre-conceived notions on my part. It is lovely and makes a beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: it has a nice ring to it. i'm not a gong expert, but this definitely sounds like a gong!
customer_reviews.author: PeeliJeep

customer_reviews.title: Mossomg parts, legs.
customer_reviews.text: Came missing legs. Very disappointed. Sound is good. I will try to get legs asap otherwise it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Miami customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money especially when you have to put it together
customer_reviews.author: The Olson Family

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: There were broken pieces and it was way smaller than it looked online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble; makes a nice sound when hit. We use it in our dojo at Code Ninjas.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Torrance

customer_reviews.title: Sound that SATISFIES.
customer_reviews.text: This Gong packs a punch for it's size.The sound is genuinely "gong" not tinny or tiny. Super pleased with it. I'm considering buying several more.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo M. Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I went for this instead of a cheaper one. Beautiful sound, well made, will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wire

customer_reviews.title: great quality construction
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made very well and I know it'll last a long time. I don't think you can get a better gong of this size for the money
customer_reviews.author: AugDog

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with a pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gong for your desk. Good conversation starter and it's fun to use. I'm pretty amazed at how good the sound is. Already purchased another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer traveler

customer_reviews.title: Love my mini gong
customer_reviews.text: Love my mini gong. Sound is as expected. Placed in the perfect location in our front foyer entrance with a beautiful Buddha head and some chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but the sound has a tin can sound. I was expecting more.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Light assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known I had to do some assembly, I would not have bought it. I finally figured it out, and it is a nice piece to have. The hour I spent on assembly cost you a star.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Reed

customer_reviews.title: Wife wanted a gong, so.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife this for Christmas. She LOVES it. It is simple and unassuming in appearance, but still looks pretty sharp. The sound is decent for the size. We use the gong to celebrate notable accomplishments for ourselves and our kids...they get excited about getting to "gong the gong" when they complete a goal they've set for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: The gong itself has a nice sound but the wooden stand is poor. The legs, using the pre-drilled holes are uneven and the wood is cheap. Given the price they should be much higher quality. This is similar to other reviews, so I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decorations only
customer_reviews.text: the item has good visual presence but the sound is annoying. It is very tinny and cheap sounding. I would not recommend purchasing unless you want it for decoration only.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Crafted...
customer_reviews.text: This authentic and wonderfully crafted Asian gong puts the finishing touches on my spa room decor. Some incense, a few rings of the gong and the hot tub put me in the perfect frame of mind to let my mind wander and my soul expand. A great item for those who want authentic sounding, well constructed percussion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tornillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, but too small for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gong for my teacher's birthday. He loved it, although this gong is REALLY small. I had to get two day shipping, which made it $53, but when I received it, I found out that it was EXTREMELY small. The screws on the bottom were relatively loose, but overall, it's pretty good. If you are looking for a small gong, this is the right choice for you! The gong itself has three different materials (metals I think) making it up, so it has three different sounds. It's pretty cool though!
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: His roommate is nearly deaf but my pal loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend who had just returned home post surgery. His roommate is nearly deaf but my pal loved it.
customer_reviews.author: enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Desk!
customer_reviews.text: My company hits the gong when we get an order over a certain amount. One location has a gigantic gong and we wanted to get a smaller desktop version for our other locations. We've now purchased three of these and our employees love it. It doesn't take up much room at all and has a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very happy that I purchased this item
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gong. Wood is plain yet black colour enhances the actual gong making the whole piece look classy. Gong makes a lovely sound. Very happy that I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: D. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: they are very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Just what the recipeint wanted. they are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: A very Nice Desk Gong - love things that make a Great Noise!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Sound, glad to have it... it sits on a shelf in our Kitchen Dining Area, a nice Decoration, adds Character to our home, was a gift for my wife last year, like the look, sound. I recommend it. She was a percussionist... Get it, love it, enjoy.. -30-
customer_reviews.author: Tom Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Tiny gong
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice gong, but tiny (about 7 inches in diameter) and lightweight. It sounds nice but doesn't sustain the sound for long. If you're looking for a small gong, consider the slightly larger Zildjian gong for $75, which is more substantial and has a louder, stronger sound that sustains longer.
customer_reviews.author: Drdul

customer_reviews.title: Authentic gong sound
customer_reviews.text: This gong has an authentic gong sound. I originally purchased a cheaper brand, but it had a tinny sound. My son loves it. I also have a wind chime from Woodstock. It has a beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gong puts out such a pretty sound! Although it is not large in size
customer_reviews.text: This gong puts out such a pretty sound! Although it is not large in size, this gong makes such a nice accent & strong sound. very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KT Keys

customer_reviews.title: good sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good for a gong that size. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: ... for not understanding the dimensions) but it would be nice to have a picture of it next to another ...
customer_reviews.text: The chime is much smaller than I thought it would be (obviously partly my fault for not understanding the dimensions) but it would be nice to have a picture of it next to another item for context of size. It is also not very loud when you chime it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth K.

customer_reviews.title: My fellow employees love it. I love the calming sound
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to work for my desk. My fellow employees love it. I love the calming sound !!! Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet but Larger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product but for something labeled "Desk" i thought it would be a little smaller lol.. This thing is about the size of 1/2 a cereal box. It looks better on a Bookshelf than a desk. Otherwise decent quality and gong.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Freak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what I used it for as a kinda retirement gift.
customer_reviews.text: excellent. Gave to coworker as retirement gift and had her team and close coworker sign it.
customer_reviews.author: IRON GIGANTIS

customer_reviews.title: Nice size to put on a shelf too
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Nice size to put on a shelf too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm, Loud, and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Whole lot of fun! Have it in the office where each time somebody gets something complete on their to-do list they ring the gong for the whole office to see.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: good looking
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually use this as a meditation tool. I don't think the sound of the gong really gets you there, it's not deep or resonant. But I love the way it looks on my bookshelf for the price. Wood and brass, no plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Whoever

customer_reviews.title: Cute little piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: Very small footprint too! Has a cute little sound for such a small gong. Mine came well constructed, with all parts intact and set up right. It actually sounds like a tiny E. Orthodox church chime. Very beautiful indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gong
customer_reviews.text: The gong is a beautiful addition to my meditation style living room decorating scheme. It was as described and looks like a high quality item. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Trontell

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good price, a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews of other gongs I was worried it would sound tinny, but it has a nice ring to it. The wood is a little flimsy though, one of the screws in the bottom was loose. I'd say it's pretty good for the price, especially compared to other reviews of similar products i've read!
customer_reviews.author: inkhonesty

customer_reviews.title: More than enough bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this gong to celebrate my last chemotherapy session. It definitely made enough bang for the buck(s) I paid and served its purpose well. Definitely added to the celebration.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Nice for a visual but as far as really working it does not give a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Zen Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: surprised the sound and tone were so great!
customer_reviews.text: This item was just a little gift for my husband to display in his home office. At first I was skeptical since I couldn't hear it at first but I was pleasantly surprised the tone was great and even though it isn't really expensive it does look nice in his office.
customer_reviews.author: MimDOT

customer_reviews.title: I trusted the Woodstock brand to have a good sound. I guess that was a mistake
customer_reviews.text: This is not a gong. It is a cymbal. I trusted the Woodstock brand to have a good sound. I guess that was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound. Fun way for kids and parents to stop and remind ourselves to breathe and calm down
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. We use it as a fun way to break tensions in our home. Helps disrupt the flow of arguing in a fun and easy way for our family
customer_reviews.author: Maria Marcus

customer_reviews.title: ... wood stand wobbles and to make the gong sound better I have it leaned to something
customer_reviews.text: the wood stand wobbles and to make the gong sound better I have it leaned to something.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, cute but not as nice as I was hoping for and it didn't come with the screws that you need to attach the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bhargava

customer_reviews.title: Were very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our wedding. Were very happy with it. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the desk top
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sits nicely on a night stand or desktop!
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Going, Going, Gong
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a gong with a traditional, deep, gong sound, this isn't the gong for you. However, despite its somewhat annoying tinny sound, it makes a good novelty gift and can add a unique Asian touch to your decor. This gong is not a toy so I wouldn't recommend you leave it alone with any children under 7 years old as they could break it and although you might love children, the noise (and children) will eventually get on your nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Marieh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tone and size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for desk and I use in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, I ring it at my office and annoy everyone lol!! Seriously though, it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: this sure has a nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: For a small gong, this sure has a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: pink ribbon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was just like I thought it would be. Very nice quality work.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my 23 year old son
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 23 year old son, whom is difficult to buy for. Well made and packaged very well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It makes a sound...that's about it. The noise that is produced is similar to a kitchen pot or skillet. I'm very disappointed with the purchase. I bought this thinking it would have a lasting reverb similar tk a real gong...no where even close. It does look nice but don't expect an authentic gong sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: A Real Gong Show
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He absolutely loved it. It is just the right size for a desk or office. Stylish design makes for attractive home decor. Just the right amount of "gong sound" without being overpowering. Even though this was not a new item it came in the original packaging with all the accessories and a nice booklet. Very much worth the price even not in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: jabber

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The metal is of low quality so the sound is more of a "thud" than a treu gong sound.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ringer - Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great gong, had others, this is real
customer_reviews.text: perfect, not a tinny drum cymbal, not a industrial sound. you cant get cathedral sound from this size but it is very well made and sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Outside Philly

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and somewhat bigger than expected. While some reviewers say no mallet was included, there was one with this order
customer_reviews.author: nyprof

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not as full as I expected for the price, and it's smaller than I pictured it.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ4520

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money but nice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not ripping this gong its very nice ...BUT it is NOT worth the price...It should maybe around a $25.00 item. Again the gong itself is very nice and looks nice in my home ...but had I to do over again I might re-think buying it as its not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDF

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best gift I have ever purchased through Amazon. It is perfect! Described just as it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: The sound is the whole point!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I was tempted to buy cheaper, but after reading reviews and listening to the sound recording on this one's product page, I just had to have it - a gong that sounds really nice and real. A little pricey but worth it. Thank you for a beautiful item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Urban

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because it's slightly unstable and it is not sounding as good as I expected (brass gong is very thin)
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely decorative gong, 4 stars because it's slightly unstable and it is not sounding as good as I expected (brass gong is very thin).
customer_reviews.author: Michele F. Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: A Work Of Art And Conversation Piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this gong because it is hand hammered and painted as well as fun for my grandchildren who like to announce each other with a stroke of the gong and a fake high title, like "announcing _____________ ______________, queen of the world." I recommend it for anyone interested in an attractive work of art, conversation piece or arty toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J Korgen

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: this gong is a great gift for business, for the family or any person. It is simple, the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Marciales Parra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gong
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful with loud sound. Great value for price. Goes well with Zen decor. I get many compliments on it in my meditation room.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little gong. It is daintier than others I have seen, but it makes a nice accent piece in my living room and has a nice ring to it. I am pleased with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: outdoors_mama

customer_reviews.title: A nice accent piece...
customer_reviews.text: ...plus its just kinda cool to own a gong! After banging a gong in a Chinese restaurant, I had to get one for myself. Of course, this one is much smaller, but I think that it has a nice sound. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Digistyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice gong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very classy little gong. It's pretty loud, even though it's not a large gong. It sits nicely on the desk. I work in a law office, and we give the gong a smack every time we win a particularly difficult case!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: The Gong is Great
customer_reviews.text: The gong is well built and has an expected sound. Although my male friend says the gong doesn't work (his wife doesn't quickly respond when he striks the percussion instrument), it was delivered on time, it is well made and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Branka

customer_reviews.title: Bang a Gong Not
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it looks pretty good on the counter, but as far as sound goes, it's pretty minimal and very tinny. But for the money, it's about what I expected. If you want real gong sound you can pretty much only get that at a much higher price new.
customer_reviews.author: Sochorr26

customer_reviews.title: Deak Gong
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hit in the office, till my boss made me get rid of it...It now is a nice conversation piece in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This gong looks great, but sounds terrible. I bought it to use at a junior high school to reward students for their achievements on tests, however when it arrived on for the legs was loose and the screw was made of brass and stripped when I attempted to fix it. The sound that was posted with this gong must have been from a perfect example or another product. I can make the same sound using pans. I sent it back, Amazon was great with the return and purchased a Zildjian instead. If you are looking for a decorative piece, this gong is great, however if you want it to function spend more on a real gong.
customer_reviews.author: WoodworkerNY

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for any Scrubs fans out there
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So maybe it is a semi-obscure television reference, but for those that love the TV show, they will get the importance of "The Gong". I suppose there is some little part inside of me that likes to think I have a friendship similar to the one that sits at the center of scrubs between Dorian and Turk. In any event, the friend I got this for says it's pretty well made. Just like in scrubs, he only rings it for special occasions and even though I am 8000 miles away, I like to think I can hear it each time he does. You go gongin' buddy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitelaw

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: This gong is also on my desk (as a teacher) and it is an outstanding piece. I was worried that it would be cheap or chintzy, but it is a quality piece of equipment that has a great tone on top of being very attractive. Excellent purchase in my own opinion; people love this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Russell

customer_reviews.title: This was very cheaply made. I bought it for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very cheaply made. I bought it for my son to bang when he finished his chemotherapy treatments (his chemo unit didn't have a bell or gong). We left it with the nurses for other patients to use.

product_meta.title: Woodstock Chimes WDG The Original Guaranteed Musically Tuned Chime Desk Gong, Black/Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Black/BronzeNothing has the ability to transport us to another time and place quite like the brilliant resonance of a gong. For over a thousand years, gongs of various types have played an important role in both the religious and secular music of many Asian cultures. Gongs were sounded to chase away evil spirits, warn of invading armies, heal the sick and invoke the spirits of the dead. To be touched by a gong was said to bring happiness and strength. Today, this revered instrument of warriors, emperors, princes and priests adds a special aura to any setting. Handcrafted using traditional methods, Woodstock Gongs brings the ancient wonders of the Far East home. Over 30 years ago, Grammy award-winning musician and instrument designer Garry Kvistad created the first Woodstock Chime from an aluminum lawn chair he found in a landfill. Fascinated by the Scale of Olympos, a 7th century pentatonic scale that can’t be played on a modern piano, Garry cut and tuned the lawn chair tubes to the exact frequency of the ancient scale. The resulting Chimes of Olympos was the first Woodstock Chime and is still one of our best selling, musically-tuned windchimes. Garry and his wife Diane founded Woodstock Chimes in 1979 and still develop the chimes today. It remains a family-owned business in New York’s Hudson Valley.
feature_bullets: Woodstock Gongs are hand-hammered by a master gong maker and materials that have gone into crafting gongs for thousands of years, so each one delivers a rich, authentic sound
Black finish ash wood, brass and black gong, mallet
Perfect in a classroom, as a gift or in your daily meditation practice

Over 30 years ago, Grammy award-winning musician and instrument designer Garry Kvistad created the first Woodstock Chime from an aluminum lawn chair he found in a landfill; Garry and his wife Diane founded Woodstock Chimes in 1979 and still develop the chimes today
